originalText.text: My daughter is currently enrolled in Big and Tiny's Summer Camp and she LOVES it! The kind and supportive staff has made her first camp experience so much fun. The school environment is brand new, beautiful, and clean. The weekly field trips to different places around Battery Park is incredible. We are so happy we have found Big and Tiny and look forward to continuing her education with them in the fall.

text.text: My daughter is currently enrolled in Big and Tiny's Summer Camp and she LOVES it! The kind and supportive staff has made her first camp experience so much fun. We are so happy we have found Big and Tiny and look forward to continuing her education with them in the fall.

originalText.text:
From a childcare standpoint, it would be difficult to find a more caring, loving, and qualified team of early childhood educators than the ones you'll meet at Big and Tiny. This organization takes early childhood education seriously, and it shows.

The physical space of the Battery Park location is stunning and very thoughtfully and deliberately planned.

As a parent, I have found the staff, faculty, and management exceedingly supportive, approachable, and compassionate. I am endlessly impressed, amazed, and grateful for the love with which this team operates. Both kids and parents alike are the lucky beneficiaries of the Big & Tiny organization.

Keep it up!

originalText.text:
The best daycare I have ever seen in my life.

This is by no means an overstatement. This place is the best daycare I have ever seen in my life, period. The infrastructures are big, fun and safe. The activities are diverse, smart and entertaining.

But the best part is the teachers. The teachers are caring while helping the children to learn how to respect the others and the group. They are working at stimulating the kids while always respecting their pace and personnalities. They are profesionnal while being kind and considerate.

Kids at Big & Tiny are educated and loved. As a parent, leaving our little one in their care felt right. And I did not even write about how much she loved being there...

originalText.text: My child is enrolled in the toddler program at Big and Tiny Battery Park. I am so thankful that I came across Big and Tiny in my need for a quality child care facility. Our experience there has been so amazing, the teachers are so caring and loving, as well as educated in the field of working with young children. I feel safe and comfortable with my child under their care. I highly recommend Big and Tiny.

originalText.text: While spending a few days in NYC, we decided to leave our child at Big and Tiny,  and we are nothing but grateful about the care they gave to our baby. The place is amazing and teachers are extremely caring and professional. Thank you for making our stay a better one :)
